text: Cherith Baldry (born on January 21, 1947, in Lancaster, England) is an author. She grew up on a farm, and first worked as a teacher, but eventually became a full-time writer. She wrote the Eaglesmount series. She also works with Kate Cary, and Victoria Holmes under the pen name of Erin Hunter, writing the Warriors and Seekers series. Baldry owns two cats, Bramble and Sorrel, and lives in England. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Cherith Baldry
